To those who were in authority, whom the Lord is now judging, that they may repent and find mercy from God Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.
1 broadside.
Printed for Thomas Simmons, London, 1660.
Signed: J.N. Attributed to James Naylor by Wing. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
